snippet.title: Deadpool 4: Everything We Know So Far (And Whatâ€™s Still Rumor)
snippet.description:
Deadpool 4 Explained: Why Its Timing Changes the MCU.

Ryan Reynolds may have quietly confirmed Deadpool 4, and if thatâ€™s true, it raises massive questions about where the Marvel Cinematic Universe is headed next â€” especially with Avengers Doomsday looming.

Deadpool & Wolverine wasnâ€™t just a hit, it was one of Marvelâ€™s biggest recent successes. Now rumors suggest the next Deadpool movie could be moving forward faster than expected, potentially tying directly into the fallout of Avengers Doomsday. But is this sequel really about multiversal chaos, or is something else pushing Reynolds to prioritize Wade Wilson right now?

In this video, we break down the strongest Deadpool 4 plot theories, including where it might take place in the MCU timeline, whether Deadpool appears in Avengers Doomsday, and why his universe could be the one that doesnâ€™t survive. We also explore how Doctor Doomâ€™s role in the multiverse could reshape Deadpoolâ€™s future â€” and what that means for Spider-Man, Wolverine, and the X-Men.

From offscreen drama to franchise-altering stakes, Deadpool 4 may be far more important than just another sequel. If the timing isnâ€™t accidental, this movie could redefine Deadpoolâ€™s place in the MCU after Doomsday and Secret Wars.
